semantic_event.name: WORKBENCH_ADD_FLASK
semantic_event.description: A 250mL Erlenmeyer Flask (ID4) is added to the workbench. The contained solution is: Solution C (0E0g of H2O, 1E-7M of H+, 1E-7M of OH-, 1E0M of C; V=100 mL, T=298.15K).

semantic_event.name: WORKBENCH_ADD_FLASK
semantic_event.description: A 250mL Erlenmeyer Flask (ID7) is added to the workbench. The contained solution is: Solution A (0E0g of H2O, 1E-7M of H+, 1E-7M of OH-, 1E0M of A; V=100 mL, T=298.15K).

semantic_event.name: SOLUTION_MIX
semantic_event.description: 100 mL from 250mL Erlenmeyer Flask (ID7) that contains Solution A (0E0g of H2O, 1E-7M of H+, 1E-7M of OH-, 1E0M of A; V=100 mL, T=298.15K) are poured into 600mL Beaker (ID9) that contains 600mL Beaker (; V=0 mL, T=298.15K). The resulting solution is 600mL Beaker (0E0g of H2O, 1E-7M of H+, 1E-7M of OH-, 1E0M of A; V=100 mL, T=298.15K).
